At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may mill a card. 
[b]{2}{G}:[/b] Level 2
Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
[b]{3}{G}:[/b] Level 3
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control with counters on them have trample and indestructible.
